metadata.title: Erowid LSD (Acid) Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.

content:
Drug: LSD | cid: 5761
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.
Erowid name: lsd
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    LSD

Effects

by Erowid

DURATION #

Caution : Reactions and experiences may vary dramatically from person to person. [see below]

LSD Duration Oral Total Duration 6 - 11 hrs Onset 20 - 60 mins Coming Up 15 - 30 mins Plateau 3 - 6 hrs Coming Down 3 - 5 hrs After Effects 2 - 5 hrs Hangover / Day After - - -

EFFECTS LIST #

POSITIVE

mental and physical stimulation

increase in associative & creative thinking

mood lift

increased awareness & appreciation of music

sensory enhancement (taste, smell, etc)

closed- and open-eye visuals, including trails, color shifts, brightening, etc.

Profound life-changing spiritual experiences or personal revelations

therapeutic psychological reflection

feeling of oceanic connectedness to the universe; blurring of boundaries between self and other

perspective altering

NEUTRAL

general change in consciousness

pupil dilation

difficulty focusing

increased salivation and mucus production (causes coughing in some people)


                    Context: 
                    This chunk provides a detailed overview of LSD's effects, including duration, onset, and categorized positive, neutral, and negative effects. It is part of Erowid's LSD effects page, which presents user-reported experiences, cautions, and general information about the psychological and physiological impact of LSD within the broader context of psychoactive substances.

metadata.title: Erowid LSD (Acid) Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.

content:
Drug: LSD | cid: 5761
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.
Erowid name: lsd
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    perspective altering

NEUTRAL

general change in consciousness

pupil dilation

difficulty focusing

increased salivation and mucus production (causes coughing in some people)

unusual body sensations (facial flushing, chills, goosebumps, body energy)

unusual thoughts and speech

change in perception of time

quickly changing emotions (happiness, fear, gidiness, anxiety, anger, joy, irritation)

slight increase in body temperature (including warm body, sweaty palms, increased perspiration, warm face)

slight increase in heart rate

increase in yawning (without being tired)

looping, recursive, out of control thinking

NEGATIVE

anxiety

tension, jaw tension

increased perspiration

delusions, delusional thinking, & fanciful ideation taken as fact

difficulty regulating body temperature

nausea

dizziness, confusion

insomnia

megalomania

over-awareness & over-sensitization to music and noise

paranoia, fear, and panic

unwanted and overwhelming feelings


                    Context: 
                    This chunk is part of the "LSD Effects" section from Erowid, specifically listing the neutral and negative effects experienced by users, immediately following the positive effects and detailing changes such as altered consciousness, physical sensations, emotional shifts, and potential adverse reactions like anxiety and paranoia.

metadata.title: Erowid LSD (Acid) Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.

content:
Drug: LSD | cid: 5761
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.
Erowid name: lsd
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    nausea

dizziness, confusion

insomnia

megalomania

over-awareness & over-sensitization to music and noise

paranoia, fear, and panic

unwanted and overwhelming feelings

Unwanted or unexpected life-changing spiritual experiences or personal revelations

PTSD-style flashbacks or vivid memories of unpleasant visions, memories, or thoughts

DESCRIPTION #

LSD is a classic psychedelic, which many users feel acts as a psychological amplifier. Colors may be enhanced, patterns may be perceived, and the user may feel connected to others and to the universe at large. On the negative side, users may become paranoid or feel as if they are dying.

CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #


                    Context: 
                    This chunk is from the section detailing the negative effects of LSD, following a list of other possible adverse reactions such as nausea, paranoia, confusion, and PTSD-style flashbacks. It transitions into a general description of LSD, its psychedelic properties, and a cautionary disclaimer about variability in user experiences.

metadata.title: Erowid LSD (Acid) Vault : Effects
metadata.description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.

content:
Drug: LSD | cid: 5761
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about the mental and physical effects of LSD.
Erowid name: lsd
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: Effects

                    Text: 
                    CAUTION & DISCLAIMER #

Erowid's effects information is a summary of data gathered from users, research, and other resources. This information is intended to describe the range of effects people report experiencing. Effects may vary dramatically from one person to another or one experience to another based on a variety of factors such as body chemistry, age, gender, physical health, dose, form of material, etc.

RELATED RESOURCES #

RELATED LINKS #

None

                    Context: 
                    This section appears at the end of Erowid's LSD effects page, following descriptions of LSD's duration, positive, neutral, and negative effects. It provides a disclaimer about the variability of reported experiences, summarizes the sources of effects information, and offers related resources, links, and copyright details.
